a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTDTPOnTimeStartLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.DTP.On-time start) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a diphtheria–tetanus–pertussis (DTP) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: DTP vaccination schedule, on-time start (at ≤ 12 months of age) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTDTPOnTimeStartLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due" (where "Vaccine type" ="Tetanus and diphtheria-containing vaccines")

a:s.a:s: "Three DTP primary series doses were administered"
"No tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered"

operand.name: Three DTP primary series doses were administered
No tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered
Client's age is less than 12 months

def.name: Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for DTP vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first DTP dose as client is less than 6 weeks old. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first dose.'
"Client is due for DTP vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first DTP dose as no DTP doses were administered and and client\'s age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for DTP vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second DTP dose as latest DTP dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second dose.'
"Client is due for DTP vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second DTP dose as the latest DTP dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for DTP vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third DTP dose as the latest DTP dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for next dose.'
"Client is due for DTP vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate client with third DTP dose as the latest DTP dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"
"Client is not due for pertussis booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose. Should not vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as client\'s age is less than 1 year. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for pertussis booster dose.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for pertussis booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is at least 12 months old. Check for contraindications. Should vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as no pertussis booster dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and the latest DTP dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for pertussis booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client\'s age is less than 4 years. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose. Should vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as no pertussis booster dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and the latest DTP dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 1"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for pertussis booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with second tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is within appropriate age range and the latest tetanus and diphtheria booster dose was administered more than 4 years ago. Check for contraindications. Should vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as no pertussis booster dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and the latest DTP dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client\'s age is less than 9 years. Check for any vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose. Pertussis immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose Case 2"

'Should vaccinate client with third tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is within appropriate age range and the latest tetanus and diphtheria dose was administered more than 4 years ago. Check for contraindications. Pertussis immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete"

'Tetanus and diphtheria immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and three tetanus and diphtheria booster doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due. Pertussis immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Client is not due for pertussis booster dose"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should not vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose. Should not vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as client\'s age is less than 1 year. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for pertussis booster dose.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is not due for pertussis booster dose"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is at least 12 months old. Check for contraindications. Should not vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as the latest DTP dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for pertussis booster dose.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for pertussis booster dose"
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is at least 12 months old. Check for contraindications. Should vaccinate client with pertussis booster dose as no pertussis booster dose was administered, client is within the appropriate age range and the latest DTP dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is at least 12 months old. Check for contraindications. Pertussis immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
"Primary DTP series is complete. Client is due for tetanus and diphtheria booster dose"

'Should vaccinate client with first tetanus and diphtheria booster dose as client is at least 12 months old. Check for contraindications. Pertussis immunization schedule is complete. Three DTP primary series doses and one pertussis booster dose were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
